Footnote dynamic load capacity C: Determination of the dynamic load capacities and load moments is based on a 100 000 m travel as per DIN ISO 14728-1. Often only 50 000 m are actually stipulated. For comparison: Multiply values C, Mt and ML from the table by 1.26.
Dynamic torsional moment load capacity M: Determination of the dynamic load capacities and load moments is based on a 100 000 m travel as per DIN ISO 14728-1. Often only 50 000 m are actually stipulated. For comparison: Multiply values C, Mt and ML from the table by 1.26.
Dynamic longitudinal moment load capacit: Determination of the dynamic load capacities and load moments is based on a 100 000 m travel as per DIN ISO 14728-1. Often only 50 000 m are actually stipulated. For comparison: Multiply values C, Mt and ML from the table by 1.26.
Footnote permissible ambient temperature: 100 °C admissible for short time. For operation at negative temperatures, please consult us.
